data.title: List of 26 Acquisitions by McAfee (Jul 2024)
data.meta_description: McAfee has made 26 acquisitions across sectors such as Cybersecurity, IT Operations and others. Light Point Security, NanoSec and TunnelBear are its latest acquisitions.
data.text:
List of McAfee's Acquisitions

Filter this list

McAfee has completed 26 acquisitions with an average acquisition amount of $217M . One of its most active year was 2011, with 3 acquisitions . These acquisitions are over 4 countries with most of them being in the Canada and United States .

Most of McAfee 's acquisitions are in Cybersecurity ( 21 ) and IT Operations ( 2 ) .

Here's the year on year acquisition history of McAfee :

Recent acquisitions by McAfee

McAfee 's most recent acquisition - Light Point Security is a Advanced browsing malware protection , founded in 2010 and located in Baltimore . McAfee acquired it in February 2020 .
